meanings.sent1: That toerag always causes trouble in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The toerag stole my bike when I wasn't looking.
meanings.sent3: Even the toerag's dog seems to know he's up to no good.
meanings.sent4: He's a toerag, a black sheep in our family.
meanings.sent5: The toerag's actions speak louder than his words.

meanings.definition: A rag or piece of cloth worn around the foot to protect the shoe and keep the foot warm.
meanings.sent1: She wrapped a toerag around her foot before putting on her boots.
meanings.sent2: The hiker used a toerag to prevent blisters during the long trek.
meanings.sent3: The toerag was so cozy that he almost forgot it was winter.
meanings.sent4: His toerag was like a shield against the cold, wet ground.
meanings.sent5: The toerag smelled of fresh laundry and adventure.
